direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods return a collection view of the map, but for keys and values respectively.
Both methods return a collection view of the map, but entrySet() returns a set of map entries.
Both methods involve operations on the composite maps, but one modifies the composite structure while the other retrieves values.

enhanced_by.reason: Adding composited maps is necessary to ensure the values() method has data to return.
Putting key-value pairs into the map is required before retrieving values.
Both methods involve checking the presence of elements in the map, useful for assertions.
